data.eml:eml: Additional records of the laomediid mud-shrimp genus Naushonia Kingsley, 1897 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Gebiidea), with a revised identification key

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Komai, Tomoyuki, Anker, Arthur (2015): Additional records of the laomediid mud-shrimp genus Naushonia Kingsley, 1897 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Gebiidea), with a revised identification key. Zootaxa 3974 (3): 341-360, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3974.3.3
